attributes.action: stop Chris Eubank from burning unreasonable amounts of diesel in his truck and banish him from Brighton & Hove
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Chris Eubank is becoming too embarrassing to be associated with the cool city of Brighton and Hove. He also hasn't worked out that whilst protesting against the IRAQ war is fine on the basis of yes we did invade for their oil, but he really shouldn't then jump into his monster truck to make his point.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
